privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: At Ghazal Tech, we are committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your personal information when you visit our website or use our services.

sections.title: Information We Collect
sections.body:
We may collect personal information such as:
- Name, email address, phone number, or other contact details
- Information submitted through our contact forms
- Technical data (IP address, browser type, usage statistics)

sections.title: How We Use Your Information
sections.body:
We use the collected information to:
- Respond to inquiries
- Improve our services and website experience
- Communicate with clients or potential clients

sections.title: Cookies
sections.body: We may use cookies to enhance your browsing experience. You can disable cookies in your browser settings at any time.

sections.title: Third-Party Services
sections.body: Our website may include links to third-party websites. We are not responsible for the privacy practices of those websites.

sections.title: Data Security
sections.body: We take reasonable steps to protect your personal information from unauthorized access or disclosure.

sections.title: Your Rights
sections.body:
You may request to:
- Access or update your personal data
- Request deletion of your data from our records

sections.title: Contact Us
sections.body: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at:

terms.title: Terms of Use
terms.subtitle: These Terms of Use govern your use of our website located at example.com and any related services provided by Ghazal Tech.

sections.title: Acceptance of Terms
sections.body: By accessing and using our website, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provisions of this agreement.

sections.title: Use of the Website
sections.body: You agree to use the website only for lawful purposes and in a way that does not infringe the rights of, restrict or inhibit anyone else's use of the website.

sections.title: Intellectual Property
sections.body: All content on this site is the property of Ghazal Tech unless otherwise stated. You may not reproduce or redistribute any part of this site without our express written permission.

sections.title: Limitation of Liability
sections.body: Ghazal Tech is not liable for any damages or losses resulting from your use of the website.

sections.title: External Links
sections.body: Our website may include links to third-party websites. We are not responsible for the content or practices of those websites.

sections.title: Modifications
sections.body: We reserve the right to update or change these terms at any time. Continued use of the website means you accept those changes.

sections.title: Contact Us
sections.body: If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us at:

business-management-systems.title: Custom Business Management Systems (BMS)
business-management-systems.summary: Dashboards, roles, workflows, and reports built around your operations.
business-management-systems.heroTitle: A business system that runs your operations with clarity
business-management-systems.heroBody: We design a custom BMS that connects teams and processes in one system: roles, approvals, live reporting, and scalable workflows.
problems: Data scattered across tools with no single source of truth
Slow approvals and unclear handoffs between teams
Reports that arrive late or don't reflect reality
business-management-systems.solutionBody: We model your real operations into a structured web system with role-based access, approvals, and live metrics to help you scale.
business-management-systems.ctaTitle: Need a system that manages your business?
business-management-systems.ctaBody: Share your process and we'll design a BMS that fits your operations.

custom-web-solutions.title: Custom Web Solutions
custom-web-solutions.summary: Turn your idea into a web system, from MVP to full platform.
custom-web-solutions.heroTitle: From idea to a real web system
custom-web-solutions.heroBody: We build flexible web solutions for unique ideas, platforms, portals, and SaaS-style systems that evolve over time.
problems: A clear idea without a technical roadmap
Off-the-shelf tools that don't fit your workflow
Difficulty scaling or adding features later
custom-web-solutions.solutionBody: We plan the structure first, then build in phases so your system stays clean, scalable, and ready to evolve.
custom-web-solutions.ctaTitle: Ready to turn your idea into a system?
custom-web-solutions.ctaBody: We'll help you plan and build a web solution that grows with your product.

business-websites.title: Business Websites
business-websites.summary: Professional websites that build trust and convert visitors.
business-websites.heroTitle: A business website that builds trust
business-websites.heroBody: We craft clear, fast business websites that present your services, support multiple languages, and guide users to action.
problems: An outdated site that doesn't represent the business
Low conversions and unclear messaging
No structure for multilingual content
business-websites.solutionBody: We build a clean structure, strong messaging, and conversion-focused sections to help visitors take action.
business-websites.ctaTitle: Need a website that reflects your business?
business-websites.ctaBody: We'll build a professional site that drives trust and inquiries.

ecommerce-websites.title: E-commerce Websites
ecommerce-websites.summary: Product management, orders, and admin control built for selling online.
ecommerce-websites.heroTitle: An e-commerce site built to run smoothly
ecommerce-websites.heroBody: We build web stores that manage products, orders, and optional payments with clear admin control.
problems: Scattered product data and order tracking
Manual steps that slow fulfillment
Limited control over catalog and pricing
ecommerce-websites.solutionBody: We deliver a structured store with product management, order flows, and the admin tools you need.
ecommerce-websites.ctaTitle: Want to sell online with control?
ecommerce-websites.ctaBody: We'll build a store that keeps products and orders organized.

personal-websites.title: Personal & Portfolio Websites
personal-websites.summary: Professional presence for individuals with clear portfolio showcasing.
personal-websites.heroTitle: A portfolio that presents you professionally
personal-websites.heroBody: We create clean personal sites that highlight your skills, work, and credibility.
problems: No official page to present your work
Projects scattered across platforms
Weak first impression
personal-websites.solutionBody: We organize your work and story into a clear, fast web presence.
personal-websites.ctaBody: We'll build a portfolio that represents your expertise clearly.

web-automation.title: Web Automation & Integrations
web-automation.summary: APIs and automations that reduce manual work.
web-automation.heroTitle: Automation that saves time and reduces errors
web-automation.heroBody: We connect tools via APIs and build automation that keeps data moving between systems.
problems: Manual tasks that waste time
Repeated data entry and human error
Disconnected tools
web-automation.solutionBody: We design integrations and automation rules that sync data and trigger actions automatically.
web-automation.ctaBody: Let's automate the steps that slow your team down.

technical-audit.title: Technical Audit & Review
technical-audit.summary: A clear technical report covering performance, security, and priorities.
technical-audit.heroTitle: A technical audit that clarifies priorities
technical-audit.heroBody: We assess your web system or website and deliver a report with risks, improvements, and next steps.
problems: Repeated issues with no clear root cause
Performance slowdowns or errors
No technical direction for decisions
technical-audit.solutionBody: We review architecture, performance, and security to produce a prioritized, actionable plan.
technical-audit.ctaBody: We'll audit your system and provide actionable recommendations.

hero.title: Support that keeps your site secure and fast all year
hero.subtitle: After delivery, we don't disappear. We include one free support month within clear limits, then annual care plans tailored to your needs: security, backups, updates, and improvements - no surprises.
hero.monitorBody: We keep an eye on uptime, performance, and critical updates.

freeSupport.title: 🎁 One free support month after delivery for projects we built
freeSupport.limitNote: Clear free limits: no new features, major redesigns, or full page restructures.
freeSupport.modalIntro: Small edits include: copy changes, image swaps, link updates, minor section order changes, and light spacing/color tweaks.
freeSupport.modalExcluded: Not included: full redesigns, new pages with new logic, payment/booking integrations, major database or permissions changes.

hero.title: We don't just build websites...
hero.highlight: We build systems that live and grow with your business
hero.subtitle: Ghazal Tech is a technical partner specializing in modern websites and web systems, with a strong focus on quality, scalability, and long-term support.
hero.cardBody: We design journeys that keep your platform stable, supported, and ready to scale.

who.title: Who we are
who.body: We are a technical team with a product mindset, not a fast-delivery mindset.
who.body2: We believe a successful website or system isn't just a beautiful interface, but a solid foundation, thoughtful UX, and a platform you can support and improve for years. We serve companies and individuals looking for real solutions, not temporary fixes.

values.title: Product mindset
values.desc: We build for growth, not just launch.

values.title: Clarity before execution
values.desc: Scope, phases, and goals are defined upfront.

journey.title: Our journey
journey.subtitle: An interactive timeline of how Ghazal Tech evolved.

steps.title: The beginning
steps.desc: We started with a passion for building web experiences, focused on detail and quality.

steps.title: Building the method
steps.desc: Over time, we shaped a clear way of working: analyze, design, build, support.

steps.title: Specialization
steps.desc: We focused on modern web solutions, admin systems, and smart dashboards.

steps.title: Today
steps.desc: We deliver end-to-end services: from idea to continuous technical support.

steps.title: The future
steps.desc: A complete tech platform and SaaS services that support clients long term.

cards.title: We think in systems, not pages
cards.desc: Every project is a system that should scale.
cards.detail: We map data, roles, and flows early to avoid rework later.

cards.title: Clarity before delivery
cards.detail: You always know what's included and when it ships.

cards.title: Support is part of the product
cards.desc: Delivery is not the finish line.
cards.detail: Care plans keep the system healthy after launch.

finalCta.title: If you're looking for a technical partner, not just a vendor
finalCta.body: We are here to help you build a stable, scalable project with professional support.

hero.title: FAQs... with clear answers
hero.subtitle: We collected the most common questions about services, support, pricing, and workflow so you can decide with confidence.
placeholders: How long does a website take?
Do you offer support after delivery?

empty.title: No questions found
empty.body: Try a different category or clear your search.

cta.title: Didn't find your question?
cta.body: Contact us and we will reply within 24 business hours.

finalCta.title: Ready to start with confidence?
finalCta.body: If everything is clear now, you can move forward with a service or a support plan.

general.q: Is Ghazal Tech a company or a freelance team?
general.a: Ghazal Tech is a technical partner with a professional methodology, delivering web systems with structured support - not just fast project execution.

general.q: Can I request just one service?
general.a: Yes. You can request a single service such as a website build, a technical audit, or ongoing support without bundling other services.

projects.q: How long does a website take?
projects.a: It depends on scope, but most projects finish in 2 to 6 weeks after requirements are defined clearly.

projects.q: Can I make changes during delivery?
projects.a: Yes, within the agreed scope. Anything outside the scope is reviewed and quoted separately.

support.q: Do you provide support after delivery?
support.a: Yes. We include one free support month after delivery, within clear limits that cover bug fixes and light edits.

support.q: What happens after the free month?
support.a: You can choose an annual care plan (Care / Care+ / Growth) or continue without a plan.
Support is offered as annual plans to reduce monthly overhead and keep your system stable.

pricing.a: Listed prices are clear reference points, but every request is reviewed before activation to confirm scope.

pricing.q: Do I pay directly on the website?
pricing.a: No. You submit the plan request first, then we confirm details with you before activation.

revisions.q: What counts as a small edit?
revisions.a: Small edits include text changes, replacing images, rearranging sections, or light UI tweaks without logic changes.

revisions.q: Can I request a big feature under support?
revisions.a: Large features (like booking or payments) are priced as a separate project even if you have a support plan.

dashboard.q: Can I track what is happening on my site?
dashboard.a: Yes. Once a plan is active, you get a dashboard to follow subscription status and the work log.

dashboard.q: Can I send change requests from the dashboard?
dashboard.a: Yes. You can submit requests and comments directly from the dashboard within plan limits.
